DataElement.preferredName: Disease Response Domain Target Lesion London Deauville Criteria Point Scale Assessment Test Occurrence Index Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A question that asks for numerical score of Deauville Criteria 5 Point Scale disease response assessment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease Response Domain Target Lesion London Deauville Criteria Point Scale Assessment Test Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A domain for disease response evaluations._An object fixed as a goal or point of examination; something to point at; a destination._A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part._A 5 point scale devised to assess the response to treatment of Hodgkin and Aggressive Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._An indication or description that a test has occurred.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A domain for disease response evaluations.

Concepts.definition: A domain for disease response evaluations.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the response criteria (includes RECIST and others) and associated documentation of disease.
